topComments.author: Hernan Landi
topComments.comment: Bonito lugar

topComments.author: Maura L
topComments.comment: Definitely fun for everyone. We went on a Monday and got there basically as they opened. For about an hour lines were very short but around 11:30 the crowds started picking up. Even though some lines were longer we got through them pretty quickly. Surprisingly the restrooms were still pretty clean throughout the day considering how busy it was. Definitely recommend if you have the time for it.

topComments.author: Jesseka ALMANZA
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitou todo o caminho do Texas. Dentro do Mall of America (maior shopping dos EUA) adorei o estacionamento gratuito. O pre√ßo do parque era acess√≠vel. $ 40 um bilhete para um passe de um dia inteiro. Visitado em uma ter√ßa-feira (tinha pre√ßos de crian√ßa para meus 3 anos de idade), a √∫nica desvantagem foi que nem todos os passeios estavam abertos. Park √© um Lil pequeno, mas as crian√ßas gostaram. Realmente tem √≥timos passeios para a pequena √°rea. Tamb√©m gostei dos passeios.  (Original) Visited all the way from Texas. Inside the Mall of America ( largest mall in the US) I loved it was free parking. Price for park was affordable. $40 a ticket for an all day pass.  Visited on a Tuesday ( had Toddler prices for my 3 yr old) only downside was not all rides were open. Park is a Lil small but the kids enjoyed it . It really does have great rides for the small area. I enjoyed the rides too.

topComments.author: Ry An
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Est√°vamos entretidos. Vale a pena chegar cedo, pois lota r√°pido. Ficamos todos surpresos que eles n√£o tivessem quiosques presenciais abertos para vender pontos. As filas dos quiosques automatizados eram super longas. Teria sido bom ter pelo menos o dobro do n√∫mero de quiosques automatizados, dada a demanda.  As linhas eram razo√°veis, mas ficou ocupado rapidamente. Voc√™ quase precisa de mais alguns mapas, pois h√° v√°rios becos sem sa√≠da. N√≥s nos divertimos, mas sa√≠mos antes que ficasse muito ocupado. Voltaremos novamente.  (Original) We were entertained. It's definitely worth arriving early as it got busy fast. We were all surprised that they didn't have any in person kiosks open to sell points. The automated kiosks' lines were super long. It would have been nice to have at least double the number of automated kiosks given the demand.  The lines were reasonable, but it did get busy fast. You almost need a few more maps around as there are a number of dead ends. We enjoyed ourselves but left before it got too busy. We will be back again.

topComments.author: C S
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) No geral, um √≥timo momento para toda a fam√≠lia. Pagamos US$ 45 por ingresso x 6 pessoas. Ap√≥s o fato, descobrimos que um pacote de 2 ingressos no Costco custava US $ 69,99! Se voc√™ √© um membro, definitivamente v√° para Costco & pr√©-pago para economizar $$$! Eles t√™m uma grande variedade de atra√ß√µes para os mais pequenos at√© os ca√ßadores de emo√ß√µes. Se voc√™ est√° no Mall of America e gosta de parques de divers√µes, n√£o deixe de planejar uma visita!  (Original) Overall, a great time for the whole family. We paid $45 per ticket x 6 people. After the fact, we found that a 2 pack of tickets at Costco was $69.99! If you're a member, definitely go to Costco & pre-pay to save $$$! They have a wide variety of attractions for the little ones on up to the thrill seekers. If you're at Mall of America & enjoy amusement parks, make sure you plan a visit!

topComments.author: Nykky L
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Estive aqui duas vezes de NC. Uma vez no domingo e uma vez durante a semana. Mesmo quando est√° cheio, as filas n√£o s√£o muito longas e andam muito r√°pido. N√£o h√° uma tonelada de passeios, talvez 20 no total, mas eles ainda s√£o divertidos e a 40 $ √© um bom pre√ßo. Meus filhos adoram vir aqui e com o shopping center e as sele√ß√µes de restaurantes do lado de fora do port√£o, h√° algo para todos, com certeza.  (Original) I have been here twice from NC. Once on a Sunday and once during the week. Even when it's busy the lines aren't super long and move very quickly. There aren't a ton of rides maybe 20 in total but they are still fun and at 40 $ it's a good price. My kids love coming here and with the shopping mall and the restaurant selections right outside the gate there is something for everyone for sure.

topComments.author: Anna Burnham
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s n√£o visitamos aqui com frequ√™ncia, mas eles t√™m alguns passeios bem divertidos aqui. N√≥s gostamos mais das montanhas-russas. O passeio Ghost Blasters tamb√©m √© muito divertido. √â um pouco caro, mas divertido de fazer ocasionalmente. Pegamos a pulseira de 5 horas e achamos que era tempo suficiente para fazer tudo algumas vezes em um dia de semana. Meus filhos adoraram.  (Original) We don't visit here often, but they have some pretty fun rides here. We like the roller coasters best. The Ghost Blasters ride is pretty fun, too. It's a little on the expensive side but fun to do occasionally. We got the 5 hour wrist band and thought that was enough time to do everything a few times on a weekday. My kids loved it.

topComments.author: Janelle Donovan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tanta divers√£o para adultos e crian√ßas. N√≥s s√≥ fomos em um passeio devido a limita√ß√µes de tempo, mas definitivamente queremos voltar e experimentar todos os passeios. A √∫nica coisa que foi decepcionante √© que eles n√£o tinham mercadorias especificamente para o Universo Nickelodeon (como se eu estivesse esperando encontrar um √≠m√£ ou cart√£o postal, mas n√£o vi nada al√©m de brinquedos). Definitivamente, recomendo chegar l√° quando ele abrir, pois conseguimos entrar nos passeios com linhas m√≠nimas. Andar por a√≠ √© gr√°tis, mas para os passeios √© preciso comprar ingressos.  (Original) So much fun for adults and kids. We only went on one ride due to time constraints, but definitely want to go back and try all of the rides. Only thing that was disappointing is that they didn't have merch specifically for the Nickelodeon Universe (like I was hoping to find a magnet or postcard but didn't see anything but toys). Definitely recommend getting there right when it opens as we were able to get right on the rides with minimal lines. Walking around is free, but for the rides you have to buy tickets.

topComments.author: Anna Liceaga
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nickelodeon era foda!! Tanta coisa para fazer. As filas eram definitivamente longas, mas o que voc√™ pode esperar no maior shopping do mundo lol. Com certeza valeu a pena. Passeios para todas as idades. Comida e bebida l√°. Pulseiras com certeza o caminho a percorrer. um pouco caro mas vale a pena. Ficamos quase o tempo todo.  (Original) Nickelodeon was dope !! So much to do. Lines were definitely long but what can you expect at the biggest mall in the world lol. It was definitely worth it. Rides for all ages. Food and drinks in there. Wristbands for sure the way to go. a little pricey but it's worth it . We stayed almost the whole time.

topComments.author: China Reese
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Localizado no Mall of America. N√£o consegui aproveitar as atra√ß√µes devido a restri√ß√µes de hor√°rio. No entanto, pelo que vi, parece um √≥timo lugar para todos se divertirem em fam√≠lia. O fato de estar dentro de casa o torna ainda maior, pois voc√™ est√° protegido dos elementos externos, atra√ß√µes e pontos tur√≠sticos emocionantes esperam por voc√™.  (Original) Located in the Mall of America. Didn't get to enjoy the attractions due to time restrictions. However, from what I saw, it looks like a great place for everyone to enjoy some family fun. The fact that it is indoors makes it even greater as you are protected from the outside elements, Exciting attractions and sights await you.

topComments.author: Isabella Andrade
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um grande parque de divers√µes! N√£o esperava que fosse t√£o grande, pois fica dentro de um shopping, mas foi uma visita incr√≠vel. Os passeios s√£o muito divertidos, mesmo para crian√ßas pequenas. Fui com uma crian√ßa de 3 e 9 anos e todos se divertiram muito (e eu tamb√©m!).  (Original) Such a great amusement park! I wasn‚Äôt expecting it to be so big, since it‚Äôs inside a mall, but it was an amazing visit. The rides are so much fun even for young kids. I went with a 3 and 9 years old and they all had a lot of fun (and so did I!).

topComments.author: Rob Puckett
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o foi uma experi√™ncia ruim; muitas coisas foram encerradas, o que suponho que seja por causa da equipe, o que √© compreens√≠vel. Al√©m disso, as coisas tendem a ser um pouco caras, mas √© uma grande visita tur√≠stica no shopping, ent√£o novamente compreens√≠vel. Passei e fiz alguns jogos com as crian√ßas. √© mantido limpo e, na maioria das vezes, as pessoas pareciam estar se divertindo.  (Original) It was not a bad experience; lots of things were shutdown, which I assume is because of staffing, which is understandable.   Also, things tend to be a bit overpriced, but it's a big tourist visit at the mall, so again understandable.   I walked through and did a few games with the kids. it's kept clean, and for the most part, people seemed to be enjoying themselves.

topComments.author: tim jenkins
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levou netos, v√°rios passeios foram fechados mas se divertiram nos abertos!! Caro, mas valeu a pena ver as crian√ßas se divertirem. Use meias, .. para entrar na √°rea de recrea√ß√£o da Patrulha Canina ou voc√™ tem que comprar algumas.  (Original) Took grandkids, several rides were closed but had fun on the open ones!! Pricey but was worth seeing kids have fun. Wear socks,.. to go into Paw Patrol play area or you have to go buy some.

topComments.author: Autumn Vymetal
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque de divers√µes incr√≠vel especialmente para estar dentro de casa. √â um √≥timo lugar para ir com a fam√≠lia e h√° muitas lojas infantis ao redor para os mais pequenos. A pulseira que dura o dia todo vale a pena, pois voc√™ pode fazer todos os passeios v√°rias vezes. Alguns dos passeios foram fechados por raz√µes de seguran√ßa, mas diferente daquele lugar incr√≠vel para ir se voc√™ estiver visitando ou na √°rea.  (Original) Amazing amusement park especially for being indoors. It's a great place to go with the family and there are plenty of kids stores around it for the little ones. The all day wristband is worth it as you can ride all of the rides multiple times. A couple of the rides were closed for safety reasons but other than that awesome place to go if your visiting or in the area.

topComments.author: Phillip Hilleshiem
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Foi incr√≠vel, meus filhos adoraram, foi √≥timo ter passeios adequados at√© para nossos beb√™s, ningu√©m se sentiu exclu√≠do. A onda cerebral foi incr√≠vel, recomendo para quem gosta de emo√ß√µes. Muitos tamb√©m, eles t√™m um fliperama e lojas de presentes e comida ali para aproveitar, eu daria 5 estrelas, mas direi que √© caro, √© bastante pequeno quando se trata de parques de divers√µes, mas tamb√©m √© mais caro do que muitos que eu tamb√©m estive.  (Original) It was amazing, my kids loved it, it was great to have rides that were suitable for even our toddlers, Noone felt left out. The brain surge was awesome I recommend that anyone who likes thrills. Lots too do, they have an arcade and gift shops and food right there to enjoy, I'd give it 5 stars but I will say it is expensive, it's fairly small when it comes too amusement parks but it's also more costly than many I've been too.

topComments.author: Matt R.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este parque √© bom com grande tema! Este parque √© definitivamente voltado para as crian√ßas e n√£o h√° muito para os ca√ßadores de emo√ß√µes como eu. Eu montei o Bob Esponja Rock Bottom Plunge muitas vezes, mas fora isso eu realmente n√£o gostei de muitos passeios.  (Original) This park is good with great theming! This park is definitely geared towards the kids and there's not much for the thrill seekers like me. I rode the SpongeBob Rock Bottom Plunge many times but other than that I didn't really enjoy too many rides.

topComments.author: Jeff Parnes
topComments.comment: Be prepared,  the tickets can be spent like water. All the rides we rode were fun. But I purposely bought tickets in groups of 18 so we would know our limits.

topComments.author: Christina Kaye
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Minha filha e eu nos divertimos muito !! No entanto, os tempos de espera podem ser um pouco longos, dependendo do qu√£o ocupado est√°. Acho que eles precisam de mais horas de opera√ß√£o, ent√£o vale a pena o dinheiro que pagamos em passagens. A melhor hora para ir √© quando eles abrem para que voc√™ n√£o desperdice seu dinheiro. Eles abrem √†s 11 e fecham √†s 7. A espera √© t√£o longa que voc√™ n√£o consegue terminar o parque em um dia. Fora isso, n√≥s nos divertimos, muitos passeios super legais, montanhas-russas. Muita divers√£o para toda a fam√≠lia !! Eu dei 4 estrelas üåü porque n√£o est√° aberto o tempo suficiente.  (Original) My daughter and I had a blast!! However wait times can be a bit long depending on how busy it is. I feel they need longer hours of operation so it's worth the money we pay in tickets.  The best time to go is when they open so you don't waste your money. They open at 11 and close at 7. The wait times are so long that you can't finish the park in one day. Otherwise we had fun, lots of super cool rides , coasters.  A ton of fun for the whole family!! I gave it a 4 star üåü because it's not open long enough.
